tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movies (
    movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    movie_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    release_year INT,
    rating FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE movies (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), rating INT);
CREATE TABLE ratings (id INT PRIMARY KEY, movie_id INT, user_id INT, rating INT);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    movie_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL(3,1),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE movies (movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  movie_name VARCHAR(50),
  release_year INT,
  rating FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE genres (genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  genre_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE Movies (movie_id INT,
                 title VARCHAR(255),
                 release_date DATE,
                 rating FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE Genres (genre_id INT,
                 genre_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE MovieGenres (movie_id INT,
                        genre_id INT);
